job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The role will be focused on backend development. You'll focus on delivering product features, developing backend APIs, data collection and ingestion services.

   The team

   Our tech team is based in Amsterdam, where most of us work 2 days a week onsite. We are a lean team of 10 senior engineers and 4 colleagues in Product and Design. Together we operate efficiently and pragmatically, where everyone's voice is heard. We are rapidly scaling so there's plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions. Apart from a short daily stand-up we keep meetings to a minimum. We do a monthly tech-team social event on Tuesday evenings that you are welcome to join.
job_details.full_text:
Software Engineer (Go)

The role will be focused on backend development. You'll focus on delivering product features, developing backend APIs, data collection and ingestion services.

   The team

   Our tech team is based in Amsterdam, where most of us work 2 days a week onsite. We are a lean team of 10 senior engineers and 4 colleagues in Product and Design. Together we operate efficiently and pragmatically, where everyone's voice is heard. We are rapidly scaling so there's plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions. Apart from a short daily stand-up we keep meetings to a minimum. We do a monthly tech-team social event on Tuesday evenings that you are welcome to join.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional backend software engineering tasks like API development and data ingestion services, with no mention of AI, machine learning, or generative models. It lacks the core elements required for ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles.

job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and maintenance of the server-side logic and infrastructure of software applications.
This indicates the core responsibility of building and implementing functionalities within a software product.
This explicitly states the task of creating Application Programming Interfaces for the backend systems.
This refers to the processes and services responsible for gathering and bringing data into a system, which is a key part of data engineering.

soft_skills.justification: This phrase highlights a practical and results-oriented approach to work.
This indicates an inclusive environment where collaboration and open communication are valued.

soft_skills.phrase: plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions
soft_skills.justification: This suggests an environment where individuals can take initiative and influence the direction of projects.
The mention of rapid scaling implies a dynamic environment that requires adaptability and continuous learning.
